Class GiveAttack

java.lang.Object
org.example.galaxy_trucker.Model.PlayerStates.PlayerState
org.example.galaxy_trucker.Model.PlayerStates.GiveAttack
public class GiveAttack extends PlayerState
The GiveAttack class represents a specific state of a player in the game where the player can initiate an attack action. This state extends the abstract PlayerState class, leveraging its structure to define and control permissible actions and commands specific to this state.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GiveAttack()
    Constructs a new instance of the GiveAttack class, representing the state where a player is allowed to initiate an attack action.

  • Constructor Details

    • GiveAttack

      public GiveAttack()
      Constructs a new instance of the GiveAttack class, representing the state where a player is allowed to initiate an attack action. This constructor initializes the state without requiring additional parameters.

  • Method Details

    • allows

      public boolean allows(GetPlasmaDrillPower action)
      Determines whether the specified GetPlasmaDrillPower action is allowed in the current state of the player.
      Overrides:
      allows in class PlayerState
      Parameters:
      action - the instance of GetPlasmaDrillPower action to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the action is permissible in the current state; otherwise, returns false.

    • createDefaultCommand

      public Command createDefaultCommand(String gameId, Player player)
      Creates a default command to be executed when the player is in the GiveAttack state. This command is specific to the player's current level and game context.
      Specified by:
      createDefaultCommand in class PlayerState
      Parameters:
      gameId - the unique identifier of the current game
      player - the player for whom the default command is being created
      Returns:
      a new instance of the GiveAttackCommand configured with the player's level and game details

    • allows

      public boolean allows(GiveAttackCommand action)
      Determines if the provided GiveAttackCommand is allowed in the current player state.
      Overrides:
      allows in class PlayerState
      Parameters:
      action - the GiveAttackCommand to be verified for allowance in this state.
      Returns:
      true if the GiveAttackCommand is permitted in this state, false otherwise.

    • toClientState

      public PhaseEvent toClientState()
      Converts the current player state, represented by the GiveAttack instance, into a corresponding client-side representation. This conversion is used to encapsulate the player's current state and phase in the game for communication with the client.
      Specified by:
      toClientState in class PlayerState
      Returns:
      a PhaseEvent object containing the client-side representation of the "Give Attack" phase, encapsulated as a GiveAttackClient.
